##Naming
> Variable and function names should be lowercase. Use an underscore (_) to separate words within a name.

> Var should be nouns and funciton should be verbs

##Syntax
> Place spaces around all infix operators (=, +, -, <-, etc.)

> Always put a space after a comma

> An opening curly brace should never go on its own line and should always be followed by a new line. A closing curly brace should always go on its own line, unless itâ€™s followed by else.

```{r eval=F}
if (y < 0 && debug) {
  message("Y is negative")
}

if (y == 0) {
  log(x)
} else {
  y ^ x
}
```

##Indentation == 2 space

##Comment
> Use commented lines of - and = to break up your file into easily readable chunks.

```{r eval = F}
# Load data ---------------------------

# Plot data ---------------------------
```
